website_summaries.verdict: This top seller comes with a very high size-to-capacity ratio for portable chargers.
pros: Small and light enough to fit in a pocket
Ability to charge an iPhone seven times
PowerIQ and VoltageBoost recharges itself in less than 10 hrs
Includes USB cable and travel pouch
cons: Some customers say that it quickly loses charging power after a year

customer_reviews.title: Great product initially but one port stopped working after 3 months
customer_reviews.text: Loved this powerbank when I initially received it (ordered in Feb 2018) and it has only been a few months and a USB port has already stopped working. I tried to use different charging cables, thinking it was the cable that was faulty but cables work with wall charger, just not the portable charger. Disappointed because this product had wonderful reviews and I really liked the high charging capacity and the small sleek design. Previously I owned portable charges with similar charging capacity but they were much more bulky. I guess my search for a great portable charger continues.
customer_reviews.author: Shab

customer_reviews.title: We purchased two or three of these and for several ...
customer_reviews.text: We purchased two or three of these and for several months they worked really well. However now we cannot charge them at all. Hopefully someone from Anker reads this review. Update: Following this review I was contacted by Anker and they sent out two replacement batteries. The batteries worked well for 10 months then wouldn’t charge and we did in fact recharge with an Anker multi charging port (works great no problems) and Anker cable. Maybe these backup batteries only last a bit less than a year or so, though that’s not what I expect as a consumer. Otherwise, Anker puts sells solid speakers we own, among other Anker products. This is why I’m so disappointing about these backup chargers.
customer_reviews.author: Steve Wise

customer_reviews.title: Started out great...  Went downhill
customer_reviews.text: I Have had this charger for 1 year and the battery charge has declined. When I first got it I could recharge my iPhone 6 4 times before needing to recharge the battery. Now it charges once and stops reporting it's charge. When I plug it in to recharge it immediately shows 3 of 4 charge lights. I expected this to last more than 1 year.
customer_reviews.author: K. Floyd

customer_reviews.title: FIRE HAZARD
customer_reviews.text: THIS IS A FIRE HAZARD! Purchased this in October 2017. First used in February 2018, plugged it in & it popped loudly & a puff of smoke emitted from the charger making both the power cord & the charge extremely hot & useless! The electrical outlet was also extremely hot! Wrote to Anker through the Amazon forum & have never heard from anyone. THESE WERE RECALLED IN 2016 & evidently the problem is not fixed. SAVE YOUR MONEY!!
customer_reviews.author: Christina

customer_reviews.title: less expensive Anker charger that has lasted for more than 2 years and works just fine. I contacted Anker's customer service dep
customer_reviews.text: After 17-18 months of use, the charger now charges very slowly, about 3% every 30 minutes. It is odd that this happened right when the warranty was set to expire. Meanwhile, I have another, less expensive Anker charger that has lasted for more than 2 years and works just fine. I contacted Anker's customer service department, and they told me they couldn't do anything since the warranty has expired.
customer_reviews.author: Abraham Garcia

customer_reviews.title: Anker Fail
customer_reviews.text: I pluged and chraged the device for 8 hours. When it was time for me to use it when im on the road. The device wont charge my phone. The Anker Powercore is either broke or not charging. I was so disappointed, luckily I had a wall plug charger on hand.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Working good!
customer_reviews.text: It's been charging for two days. Only one light flashes constantly. When I try to charge the phone, nothing happens. Update. I contacted customer support with my problem A few days later the defective power bank was replaced by a new one. I am very satisfied with the customer service work. For the last two years I have never met such an attentive attitude to the customer as in this company! Highly recommended. Thank you guys, you're the best!
customer_reviews.author: Tom Mart New York

customer_reviews.title: I'm so disappointed with this product
customer_reviews.text: I bought my anker charger in march 2017 now September 2017 and the charger is no longer charging! It just blinks one light even when I charge for the entire day! What the heck! I'm so disappointed with this product!
customer_reviews.author: Vcm

customer_reviews.title: Does not fully charge!
customer_reviews.text: Pretty sure my unit is defective, i have let it charge for over 24 hrs, not consecutively, but at 8 or so hour intervals without absolutely any use in between and the unit just keeps blinking on the 4th power light indicator, its like it never seems to register a complete charge. Reached out to support and all i was given was some random generic email response that read the charging best practices. How is that supposed to fix a bank that doesnt finish charging? I am going to request a return and refund on this thing if they dont offer an exchange for a working unit.
customer_reviews.author: Mac

customer_reviews.title: I love your products but this one went bad only 3 ...
customer_reviews.text: I hope someone from Anker read this. I love your products but this one went bad only 3 months after warranty period. Anker said it was highly unusual to have one die so soon and I actually agree that Anker products don’t usually die this quick. However Anker would not do anything to help including honoring the warranty or even giving a modest discount on a new product. Anker if you want to be top notch and you can see how much your loyal customers are purchasing hopefully you will read this and change your internal policies
customer_reviews.author: Noswal

customer_reviews.title: They only work for a few months.
customer_reviews.text: I don’t recommend this brand at all. I’ve purchased three Anker external chargers, and have been disappointed with all three. They work great at first, but within a few months they all had issues with their charging ports. The cord has to be wiggled “just right” or the battery won’t charge. After a few more months of dealing with that, it just doesn’t charge at all. Very frustrating! Waste of money. These should be marketed as disposable external batteries. They only work for a few months.
customer_reviews.author: C. Freeman

customer_reviews.title: doesn’t charge when charged
customer_reviews.text: Traveled to Asia and back through China to Thailand. This power bank was checked at every single stop (total of 6) and passed without problems. Being a 20000mA power bank it’s a good thing. *Able to charge iPhone 8 Plus 3 times. -2 stars for being completely useless while being charged. My other much cheaper power bank is able to charge my phone while the unit is charged. This doesn’t allow you to do that even if there is plenty of juice in the unit. Update. Battery is now dead. It’s been a couple of years
customer_reviews.author: Adba M.

customer_reviews.title: DO NOT PURCHASE ANKER PRODUCTS FROM AMAZON
customer_reviews.text: So far, both units I've purchased through Amazon have precisely the same exact issue. They push a charge until they no longer feel like it (let's say whatever you're charging is at 60%. You plug in the ANKER charger, sometimes it instantly initiates a charge, sometimes you have to push the button.)(Then it frequently, not every time will charge for maybe 10 minutes, no specific amount, then stop charging), you push the button again, same procedure, then again, then again. Same damn thing over and over until you resort to going 'old school's. I have 2 that I purchased directly from ANKER and they work flawlessly. Every damn time!
customer_reviews.author: Michael Turner

customer_reviews.title: It doesn’t work
customer_reviews.text: Well I literally got this yesterday to replace my old one (different brand) that I’ve had for 6+ years that I used on a daily basis and loved dearly. I’ve owned quite a few portable chargers and never had a problem with any of them.... This one charges for literally a minute before shutting off repeatedly. I charged it for about 18 hours before first use, but still, it constantly shuts off. I bought this Anker because I’m usually happy with this brand, but this one is completely useless.
customer_reviews.author: RosyRazly

customer_reviews.title: Great battery life, easily packed for travel
customer_reviews.text: I’ve always heard great things about Anker power bars so I finally decided to invest in one right before I took a 10 day long camping trip. I didn’t know how often I’d be around an electrical outlet and sometimes it was days, so having this really helped me out! It’s a tad heavy, but fit in my hiking backpack perfectly and worked very well! I charged my phone every day for 4 straight days before I was able to plug the Anker in to recharge it. It wasn’t dead yet but I didn’t know how long it would be before I could charge it back up so I just did it anyway. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Katelynn

customer_reviews.title: Big name now, POOR QUALITY.
customer_reviews.text: What the heck happened to Anker? Bought ten of these for a long trip and all of them won’t charge any of the families phones past 80%. Phones range from iPhone 6s to XR. I used to buy only Anker, but will have to look somewhere else now. So disappointed. I strongly don’t recommend
customer_reviews.author: IRONCROSS

customer_reviews.title: PLEASE READ!
customer_reviews.text: I’m reading a lot of reviews of people saying it doesn’t charge but it does. *FIRST YOU HAVE TO PLUG THE CORR IN THE USB PART FIRST AND THEN PLUG THE PORT INTO YOUR PHONE.* If you do it the other way around, it will not work. At least not for me. The initial charge to charge the battery took about half a day but it is what it is. My phone holds about 4-6 charges with this and it charges my phone fast. I appreciate that it came with a little mesh carrying bag.
customer_reviews.author: Eri Bri

customer_reviews.title: Battery life decreases after multiple use
customer_reviews.text: I'm using this product for almost 2yrs now. I mostly use this in vacation when I'm travelling. So not using it regularly. The phone I use is still the same throughout these years. But interestingly, i noticed that it can full charge my phone 3 times when in the beginning it could charge it for 5 times. Although it says, it can hold 20100mAh. But it shows that it can only hold 15000mAh at the beginning and gradually the capacity reduces. FYI, the battery capacity for my phone battery is 3000mAh. It's a Samsung S8
customer_reviews.author: Muhammad Robiul Alam Robi

customer_reviews.title: Bought this product in January 2016 and took it out ...
customer_reviews.text: Bought this product in January 2016 and took it out west that fall and the battery worked as advertised. It held a charge through the winter. The i drained the battery to make sure it would charge okay august 2017 but it wouldn't,when I called customer support they said there was nothing they could do since it was ONE MONTH out of the warranty.Bottom line if u looking for a battery that will last a year or so go ahead and buy it. As for me I won't buy another Anker product ever again !!
customer_reviews.author: eric wright

customer_reviews.title: Stops holding charge after few months
customer_reviews.text: This is the 2nd Anker Portable Charger we’ve ordered and, unfortunately, both of them have stopped working. Neither will hold a charge after using them for only a couple months. Such a bummer that we have to go with a different company now, especially with the high price of each charger.
customer_reviews.author: JKR

customer_reviews.title: Works So Well!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this charger for my 14 year old daughter to take on a seven day trip to California with her school. I wasn't sure how often she'd be able to charge her phone while she was gone. We got it charged up the day before she left, and it held it's charge until the evening that she came home. I'm super impressed with the quality, and loved that it wasn't a large and bulky thing for her to carry around in her backpack. It came with a nice bag as well to keep it from getting scratched and such. I would absolutely recommend this charger. It's the best and we look forward to using it again and again.
customer_reviews.author: NiftyNest

customer_reviews.title: Now takes a long time to charge
customer_reviews.text: Convenient and not too bulky. Right size for keeping in backpack or carry on but too heavy for keeping in a purse. Many phone charges' worth when it's full but after having this about 7 months, it takes a LONG time to fully charge - like one day per "dot" where 4 dots = full charge. The cable that comes with this is short and the connector bends easily. The amount of time it now takes get this fully charged is what I find most frustrating and reason to look for an alternative.
customer_reviews.author: TL

customer_reviews.title: Slow charge after a couple months
customer_reviews.text: It definitely holds a lot of charge, but the battery that i received barely charges my phone! Worked really well for the first few months i had it, but now it charges so slow there's no point in using it all of my other anker products work exquisitely besides this one, very unfortunate.
customer_reviews.author: Natalia Eddy

customer_reviews.title: From a noobie to other noobies; it really does hold a lot of charge
customer_reviews.text: I don't know much about power banks so reading the number "20100mAh" meant nothing to me. From the reviews and the description of this power bank, you can already tell it would hold a lot of charge. But I did my own experiment just to see if this would be perfect for me. When I travel I like to take 4 things with me; my phone, tablet, switch, and wireless earbuds. This power bank can literally charge all four of those in ONE CHARGE. Mind blown. However, I still gave it 4 stars because it doesn't have lightning charge.
customer_reviews.author: Nikki

customer_reviews.title: A better battery pack, I've never had.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as a Christmas present to myself last year. Great battery! Fast charging time for my Galaxy S8, great life, and relatively small. Inexplicably, the 'fast charge' stopped working in mid-January, right as the 30-day return period was up. I called Anker and they could not have done a better job. After I explained to them that, because of lack of a car, I couldn't easily make it out to ship it in any reasonable amount of time, they really came through. They worked with me to find a way to get me a replacement very quickly. It's now mid-March and working great. 5 stars for the battery. 5 1/2 stars for their customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Did he just...?

customer_reviews.title: Super Fast!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is small enough to take with you in your jacket pocket, or keep in your car's console, on the bedside table or wherever you might a quick charge for your phone, tablet or other USB devices. And the best part is that it will charge any device you attach to it in about a 1/3 of the time it takes from a charger plugged into your wall outlet! Gotta have it. Use it in an emergency, on a hiking trip, camping, in your car, around the house! Super portable , recharges super fast, lasts super long and looks pretty cool too! Buy one!
customer_reviews.author: John robinson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect Power but not for Air travel
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this charger. So much power. It powers numerous electronics with no problem. My only complaint, and it isn’t anyone’s fault but my own, is that you cannot bring this item on an airplane. I had never thought to check that out before purchase. I have a smaller one for air travel so will use that one. This larger one would have been my preference but it is still great for at home use.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Kathleen

customer_reviews.title: Broke early and Anker was unwilling to assist
customer_reviews.text: To date I had really appreciated Anker and there products. Until recently a rather expensive battery pack that I purchase failed just outside of warranty by no fault of my own. I called and sent Anker a request for assistance and they were absolutely unwilling to assist. They recommended that I purchase a new one, which I will not be doing. Instead I will have to identify a more reputable company in this space to give my business to. I am very upset with the customer service that they were able to provide. Will not be buying any of there products moving forward.
customer_reviews.author: Bobbo

customer_reviews.title: Compact and incredibly capable!
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely love this product. This will charge my phone multiple times over and the Ipad a few times over. This coupled with the recommended case makes it a travel necessity. With the case and the battery, I can compactly store 2-3 charging cables of different types and a wall plug. If I'm on the road, and charge my phone/ipad, i'd estimate 3 days of power off of it. Highly recommend. I have one for both the wife and I. Again, I cant reiterate the convenience for travel, its a compact kit that will handle all my charging needs and provide the opportunity for charging on the go!
customer_reviews.author: Andrew

customer_reviews.title: Great & reliable charger. 3 yrs. w/me and still working.
customer_reviews.text: It's been almost 3 years since I bought this portable charger and still working great. I wanted to wait for the review because I had some friends that were having issues with different brands (not this one) and their chargers were diying in 3 or 4 months or after traveling to 1 place. The size is perfect for traveling, is not super light but is not super heavy either. I have used this many times in different countries and still working like brand new. I can charge my phone multiple times. I really recommend this portable charger.
customer_reviews.author: Michelle

customer_reviews.title: Bad
customer_reviews.text: I orsdered the portable charger.. and now after 1month use the charger will not fully charge .
customer_reviews.author: mikhail

customer_reviews.title: Started great , now not so much
customer_reviews.text: It is exactly what I wanted, battery lasts about two weeks if not used at all. If used, I’ve gotten about 7-8 full charges on an IPhone 8 before I need to recharge the power bank. Slight dilemma is the power bank needs a long time to refill estimated 10 hours give or take, which is understandable but an issue if in a pinch for time. Update 08/23/2020- both chargers are going bad already - it’s been 36 hours and only one light has been filled on both portable charges. These were awesome and I had friends buy them but now I’m not recommending them to anyone.
customer_reviews.author: David Edgar

customer_reviews.title: bad quality - broken in 8 months
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely loved this thing. It is bulky and heavy but it charged up fast, charged devices fast, can charge two of them, could recharge my cell phone multiple times but needing to recharge it. It was charged an ipad pretty quick. All of that does not matter now as one fine day i just stopped working. It was working fine one day and the next nothing. no activity, cannot charge it, no led lights nothing. Anker seems to be making cheap quality products these days. disappointed.
customer_reviews.author: Abh

customer_reviews.title: Holds a Charge Quite Well - Not For Rough Environments, Though.
customer_reviews.text: This is a really excellent power bank. It charges reliably and holds that charge very reliably. The indicator lights are pretty accurate in displaying how much power is left (100%, 75%, 50%, 25%). The charger has some heft to it. It's not exactly light. But it has big batteries in it, so that's to be expected. The casing is hard plastic. There is no padding on the outside of the device and I suspect it would crack if dropped, given the charger's weight. If you take it to the woods, try to keep it cushioned.
customer_reviews.author: Boff

customer_reviews.title: Takes way too long to fully charge.
customer_reviews.text: Might be just a lemon, but this battery bank needs over 2 days to charge when connected to a wall outlet. I just charged it overnight (a good 10 hours or so) and it didn't even fill a single charge barldot (out of FOUR). Either this battery bank can end up serving as an uninterruptible power supply for 3 families, or it has an issue. I use this battery to power my VR headset (~5 hours continuous playtime on beat saber, ~3 hours on ALYX) so I can't say for certain whether the charge capacity warrants such a large charge time. Works decently well for travelling. I don't travel much so by the time I do it's probably fully charged.
customer_reviews.author: Ayoma Ritade

customer_reviews.title: This thing is awesome
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for a music festival. I charged my iphone 7 2 full charges, charged a speaker, partially charged about 3 other iphones. It does take close to 15 hours to get a full charge on the battery itself, but when you're recharging an iphone it charges, I would say, 2-4x faster than an outlet. I basically now charge this thing and then charge my phone off of it until this thing dies. It's awesome. I have told everyone I know to get one.
customer_reviews.author: unitmonster

customer_reviews.title: Didn’t last
customer_reviews.text: Update 10/31: for the past couple of weeks I plug in with an anker brand lightening charger and apple and other chargers and it starts to charge when I plug my phone in and then it stops I have to keep checking in and pressing the Button again to get it to start charging then it stops. Super bummed because I’ve always heard great things about anker products. And it’s expensive to die a couple months later. Previous review when I first bought it: Excellent!! Need it to charge my medical devices used while camping and also use sometimes at work it’s great! Holds a charge a long time. Anker products are really well made
customer_reviews.author: Justin S.

customer_reviews.title: Short life span product.
customer_reviews.text: I think a lot of people are writing reviews right after they recieve it. This product is great...in the beginning. I have owned this for over a year now and it takes 3 days to charge the power pack when it used to take a day. It doesn't hold a charge either, it will charge my galaxy s9plus only once and I used to be able to charge it 3 to 4 times. I understand that batteries decline as they get used but this pack has charged devices maybe 30 times. Cheap.
customer_reviews.author: Chris Rogers

customer_reviews.title: Stopped working way sooner than expected
customer_reviews.text: I'm sure this works for some people, but mine legit stopped charging or maybe even holding charge after one full cycle.
customer_reviews.author: P Lunaria

customer_reviews.title: Updating my initial review for Anker 2100
customer_reviews.text: I received the Anker charger about a week ago, it is well designed and looks sturdy, but I noticed that while charging my iPhone the charging abruptly stopped charging happened while charging my laptop. I trust Anker and have bought several items over the years their products and service are tops so I am puzzled by this, Does anyone’s as have this type of an issue? *Uptade Contacted Anker, immediate assistance they were terrific! Remedied my issue without hesitation and apologized for my inconvenience !
customer_reviews.author: vt

customer_reviews.title: Cannot take on a passenger plane & doesn't charge
customer_reviews.text: Interesting that nothing is stated on the description page about not being able to take this lithium battery charger on a passenger plane. It doesn't even state that it is lithium. Yet the box arrived with a large notice on it. Isn't the whole purpose of a power pack to charge devices when traveling? Further, It won't charge beyond one of four lights. This does NOT meet expectations!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: It’s awesome I don’t have any regrets in buying this battery bank!
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t used it yet But I’ve had Anker products in the past for devices, but honestly, it’s a great brand! It is a hefty battery so if your wanting something small to fit in your pocket this isn’t it! But it’s a great size to fit in a bag though and great for traveling! It does take about 10-12 hours to fully charge it so be aware of that. I got mine half charged and it took over 6 hours to charge it. It’s a great product though I will buy again if I need to. Anker products are an awesome brand and they have great customer service
customer_reviews.author: Toni M.

customer_reviews.title: Power Generator! I can charge my phone 6-10 times fast!
customer_reviews.text: A high power capacity power bank with 2 usb ports. I ordered this power bank to be able to charge my camera, mic, light or phone on the go. Ended up using inside the bed, near kitchen everywhere. Because it stores so much power, I can charge my phone by my side no more sitting near the electricity plug. Downside may be its a little heavy and I dont like carrying it in a small womens purse. But when I use my backpack it doesnt feel heavy at all. I can charge my iphone 11 at least 6 times may be more. ( my friends also use it) Charge time is around 10 hours.
customer_reviews.author: Alaz

customer_reviews.title: Heavy and slippery
customer_reviews.text: I needed to replace my old charger,was looking for more power and a unit that I could toss in my bag for trips to the park. This unit does take hours to reach full capacity but does a good job on most equipment. What I do not like is the weight,it is a heavy unit . Too heavy for me to routinely take with me. I use it more at night to keep my iPad charged while I watch a video before sleep. Also the finish is very slick and has slipped from my hand several times and dinged my wood floor.
customer_reviews.author: Karen Jones

customer_reviews.title: So convenient!
customer_reviews.text: Really great product. I have a secondhand iPhone 6 with terrible battery life. To avoid purchasing a new phone I use this charger, fairly frequently. If I’m out and about, I need a dependable charging method. This charger takes awhile to fully charge, but then it’s good for a week, if you utilize all three charging ports. Otherwise it lasts longer. The video show the two blue indicator lights, that will last a few more days. Fully charged, it’s four blue lights. I love this thing, you could use it at home too if you don’t want to be restricted by the outlet location. Definitely worth money spent, which wasn’t bad at all!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: GOOD EXPERIENCE WITH CUSTOMER SERVICE
customer_reviews.text: EDITED AFTER ANKER REPLACED BOTH CHARGERS. ORIGINAL REVIEW: I have 2 and neither one works. They both charged only once and then quit working. Unfortunately this product is junk. EDITED REVIEW. After seeing this review Anker Customer Service contacted me, offering to replace both chargers. I accepted the offer and now have 2 new chargers, but since I don’t use them often I can only hope that they work as advertised. The chargers are the right size, easy to use and handy so I hope they will work in the future. I advise purchasing the unit before you need it to make sure it really works.
customer_reviews.author: Mary Jane Sheppard

customer_reviews.title: Works great. Excellent customer service
customer_reviews.text: The powercore is not the lightest or smallest of chargers but it is effective and long lasting. And I love being able to charge two items at one time. When I initially received the charger, it stopped charging my iphone 6s after just a few minutes. Very maddening. So I bought an Anker brand lightening cable assuming it might be a compatibility issue. That didn’t work. When I contacted Anker they recommended some trouble shooting - which also did not work. So they deemed the charger defective and replaced it with a new one. And it works perfectly. I especially appreciate the responsive/responsible customer service.
customer_reviews.author: Brooklyn222

customer_reviews.title: Cable issues for iPhones with this charger
customer_reviews.text: I liked the fact that I could charge my iPhone almost 4 times from this charger without recharging the charger/battery. However the longer I had it ( bought it 6-7 weeks ago ) the less my phone would accept the charge. I don’t know if it was because of cable issues or perhaps that it doesn’t support iPhones ( I kept getting messages on my iPhone that the device was not supported by my phone). Yesterday I bought an Apple cable, and that has solved my charger problems for now.

customer_reviews.title: Lots of battery power!
customer_reviews.text: It took me awhile to choose an Anker battery but after reading pages and pages of reviews, I settled on this one. So glad I did! I’m not sure how long it takes to charge, but I charge it before bed anyway when I’m going to need it so charging time, whatever it is, is not of interest to me yet. I’ve taken this battery on vacation on a very long car trip and it was perfect for charging my iPhone X. Charges it multiple times. I don’t know how many times because I’ve never gotten below the 2nd bar. Works great with other portable devices, I also use it for my Nintendo 3ds game console.
customer_reviews.author: Daisy70

customer_reviews.title: So worth it, I bought it twice
customer_reviews.text: I got this for a week long camping trip, to keep my phone alive for maps and pictures. I was able to charge my Galaxy S8 from 0-100 four full times and my boyfriend's iPhone 6 twice before this thing died. I loved this charger so much that when I lost mine, I bought a new one. I just recently found the old one so basically my phone will never die. I've had the one for almost a year, it spent about 5 months under a seat in my car, and was still about 70% charged and working perfectly when I found it.
customer_reviews.author: Invictus

customer_reviews.title: Works great
customer_reviews.text: Great battery life. Easily charges iPhone 4-5 times. Just a little big for every day carry. Mostly I use it for work trips or flying when I may not be able to plug in to a wall socket easily. Next one will be a little smaller. EDIT: Works great until it doesn't. Had one that I used daily and then it no longer would take a charge. Two lights would blink and not take a charge. Very disappointed, I really liked this battery bank but its not built to last.
customer_reviews.author: James Murphy

customer_reviews.title: A minor problem after a year, but Anker and Spencer came through
customer_reviews.text: I have had this battery for almost a year. I love it. In my opinion, it stays charged longer than my brothers Mophie batteries. I use it often on trips and always make sure it's charged just in case. I had a slight problem where the battery wouldn't charge, but I called Anker and in less than 4 minutes, they have a replacement out to me. I am thankful and looking forward to using it again, because I LOVE mine :) Also, shoutout to Spencer with Anker who made the whole process easy. I'll definitely continue to buy Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Alygator

customer_reviews.title: ♥️ YOU WON'T BE DISSATISFIED - You get what you pay for! 💯
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this charger. I have soooo many friends that love this charger too. It charges things (phone, tablets, watches, etc) in so little time. Plus the life of this battery charger lasts for a very long time. Even charging multiple devices. My son begged me to let him take it on his trip (going out of state to visit family), which meant I had no battery back up for myself. So, with no ease did I even look for newer or better products with higher ratings, that's how confident and pleased I am with purchasing this device. ♥️ I SERIOUSLY RECOMMEND IT 🥰 you won't be dissatisfied.
customer_reviews.author: 🌴🌊🐚CaliGirl🐚🌊🌴

customer_reviews.title: Great Customer Service!
customer_reviews.text: I was having trouble with this battery charger after a few months. Basically it was malfunctioning and deemed unusable. I was frustrated so I contacted Anker customer support. I was met with excellent customer support and a company in Anker who believes in standing behind their products. I received a replacement in a few days and so far I’ve been happy with the replacement. Great job Anker.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Does not deliver advertised features
customer_reviews.text: The battery pack is fairly lightweight and not overly large, and is easy to use. Our pack has not come to a full charge. I have left the pack plugged into a wall outlet for two days and the fourth blue light will still blink. The battery will charge our iPhone 6 and 6S, but does not give the stated number of charges. The most we have been able to get is four. If I were to purchase a battery pack again, it would not be this one, as it doesn’t deliver the advertised features.
customer_reviews.author: Dale B.

customer_reviews.title: Indispensable!
customer_reviews.text: Took this on our 3.5 week trip, and we couldn't have lived without it! We used it for charging both phones and both tablets almost every day, and I can't believe how fast the PowerCore charged them, and how long it lasted before having to charge the PowerCore again. My only complaint is that it's a bit heavy for carrying around in your travel bag all day, but there is no way we could have lived without it. We got stuck in a thunder shower where every bit of us got soaked through - including the travel bag with charger inside, and it worked just fine after we got all dried out.
customer_reviews.author: Susan K.

customer_reviews.title: Heavy but effective
customer_reviews.text: Purchased this product in Nov 2015 at $28 on sale. It is quite heavy so not something you'd want to carry in a purse or pocket but if you need lots of juice for your devices on a photo-shoot or something of the likes then this is a good battery pack to have with you. I still use it today although I haven't used it incredibly often over the years. Remember the ideal range for the health of lithium batteries is between 40-80% so try to store your Li batteries in this range to increase longevity!
customer_reviews.author: f.b.

customer_reviews.title: Fantastic!
customer_reviews.text: This charger is amazing! I took it with me on a trip to Patagonia to hike for 4 nights and charged my phone every night, and it still had some juice left over. It takes awhile to catch the full charge, but it lasts forever! It’s a bit on the heavier side, but I don’t really notice when I’m carrying it around with me. I like that it has two slots to charge with and the blue light indicator is very helpful! Probably the best charger I’ve owned so far! Would definitely purchase again.
customer_reviews.author: Krista

customer_reviews.title: Just exactly what I did not want
customer_reviews.text: Come on Anker, your product descriptions are very confusing and I ended up purchasing exactly what I did not want. I have a Motorola e5 Plus that has TurboPower which is equal to Fast Charge 3, yet your item description is so confusing with empty description which misleads everyone. So now I have an item which will take four hours or more to charge my phone or headset. Just because of this I probably will not recommend your products to friends and family much less on social media.
customer_reviews.author: Major HavocTop Contributor: Camping

customer_reviews.title: Doesn't Fully Charge
customer_reviews.text: It could be that I got a defective one, but mine doesn't fully charge at all, no matter how many different cords and outlets I've tried to use it on. It works great when I need it to charge, but it doesn't fully charge- it only makes it to the third dot, which is a huge inconvenience. I bought it to go on vacation but I have to keep it charging in order to use it multiple times and not worry about not having enough juice to charge my cell phone. Will be requesting a replacement and try that one out--hopefully i can update my review with more positive feedback.
customer_reviews.author: Anny

customer_reviews.title: Replaced for free
customer_reviews.text: I love Anker products (I have a smaller Astro E1 (6700mAh) charger from Anker and I love it.) so I expected to love this. Right out of the box I was surprised how big it is. This is not pocket sized. The one I got did not work and I returned it. Anker sent a replacement of a different type for free for my trouble. I recommend Anker products and appreciate the responsiveness of the seller. 4 stars for having to replace it. This is the only example of a failure and I have 5 other Anker products.
customer_reviews.author: Mark C. Mcelroy

customer_reviews.title: Used damaged item being sold as new
customer_reviews.text: It was immediately clear as soon as I pulled this out of the box that this is a used item. It had scuffs and scratches all over it. Both USB ports were dusty. One of the ports was even dirty.
customer_reviews.author: C Breit

customer_reviews.title: Battery stopped charging
customer_reviews.text: After about a month of having this product, one of the battery charging indicator lights stopped working. After about 10 months of having this product, the battery no longer charges past the first indicator light. Very disappointing! I heard great things about this product before buying. I’m hoping to hear back from the manufacturer and get this issue resolved! Otherwise I cannot recommend this to others.
customer_reviews.author: Chelse

customer_reviews.title: Not worth it for the price.
customer_reviews.text: I bought this product exactly 18 months ago. I didnt touch it for the first 8 months. I kept it stored in my office for hurricane purposes. First of all ots bulky and heavy. So my phone started dying at work so I brought it everyday for the past 10 months (roughly). Today it does not hold a charge. It randomly died with no warning. I havent contacted customer service because it's been just over 18 months since purchase (literally a few days) I fear customer service wont do anything so why bother?
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: 1.5 months and it failed
customer_reviews.text: Had this for less than 2 months and it stopped takeing a charge. It has not been dropped or misused it just stopped. It was upsettung because my wife was looking forward to useing it during delivery. Even though this product looks like quality like the cheaper ones it has a high fail rate...
customer_reviews.author: Michael Howard

customer_reviews.title: The Best Customer Service
customer_reviews.text: [Update] The customer service team for this product is wonderful! They immediately sent me a replacement charger and it works perfectly. They proactively contacted me to check up on me and see if I have received the replacement and also contacted me further to see if I had any further issues. You will not go wrong with this company. I love their service! [Old]I am now on vacation in Asia where I finally need to use this. Item continuously stops charging after a few minutes, then I have to either replug or press the button on the power bank to activate charging again for a few minutes. Then rinse and repeat every few minutes.
customer_reviews.author: Van Lambert

customer_reviews.title: Long-lasting, so far
customer_reviews.text: I bought this when we were going to be camping in the wilderness for several days and I wanted to be sure my phone didn't die. (No cell connection, but it's my camera!) It had plenty of power. Now I take it with me whenever I'm going to be away from a charger for more than a few hours, just in case something goes wrong and I run low. It's a relief to know that I won't run out of battery. It does take a long time to charge up - plan for a day or so.
customer_reviews.author: A Mom of 3

customer_reviews.title: More than enough to charge iPhone and iPad
customer_reviews.text: I use this to charge my iPhone and iPad while traveling. It's perfect for throwing in my bag to make sure I never run out of juice. Typically I can get 4-5 charges out of my iPhone XR and about 2 on my iPad Pro (2017). PROS - High Capacity. - Can charge two devices at the same time. - Well made. - Accurate indicator lights. - Charges devices fast. CONS - Takes awhile for the bank to charge, I know that's standard but it takes AWHILE. Overall, I am very happy with this power bank. I highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Jeffery P.

customer_reviews.title: Ample power for several devices
customer_reviews.text: This device was used to keep 2 phones, an iPad, and a wifi hotspot up and running over a 3-week European trip. While there were only a couple times when I had to use the portable charger to bring one of our dead electronics back to life, I found it really useful to charge a couple phones at the end of the day when I had limited wall sockets. Typically, the charger only used a quarter to a half of its available power to ensure all our gear stayed charged when there weren't enough free sockets to plug in at the end of the day.
customer_reviews.author: Penang1970

customer_reviews.title: Will get another
customer_reviews.text: This power bank by Anker is excellent. Compact power for charging. Even better than expected from having one of their power banks for several years. The technology has improved. Now it’s powering the usb fan. Haven’t had to recharge it in the month since purchased. And using it daily. I am very impressed and will be getting another, along with watching what Anker comes out with in the future!
customer_reviews.author: McLeSk

customer_reviews.title: Nice backup
customer_reviews.text: I have a couple of backup batteries, but this is the best one. I use it quite often, especially when I travel. Also great to have when I am out on a motorcycle ride and need to recharge my headset or phone. Not sure exactly, but I think that I get about 6-8 charges on my Samsung S6 phone with this backup battery. When I recharge this, I use a slow low amp charger, so it takes overnight to recharge. I don't think it is good to use a fast charger on these batteries, but I may be wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Pops

customer_reviews.title: Fully charge several phones before needing a charge itself
customer_reviews.text: Needed a charger that could handle some rough camping. 3 people used this charger over a weekend to charge our phones and also a small JBL Bluetooth Speaker. It still had enough juice at the end of the trip to keep the Speaker powered up. Worked great. It's a bit heavy but seems very durable and well built. Worth the Purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Great Service Help🙂!
customer_reviews.text: Everything was working just great then I could not get the charger to indicate it was charging..I emailed them and received an answer back from someone named Luana very shortly...absolutely, totally professional! She indicated that they would want to take a look at it but once it was received by them she sent out a new replacement unit that works great! I'm talking days, not weeks or months..All I can say is that they absolutely stand behind their product with unusually great service.. something you tend not to see so much of in this day and age! For that alone I will recommend this Anker charger to anyone.. infact..I bought 2 more for my family members. Thanks Anker, Mike.
customer_reviews.author: France Hayes

customer_reviews.title: Anker customer service rocks
customer_reviews.text: Bought two, same time, same product. One will charge as seen, one will not. Tried changing cables, power squares, outlets, etc. just no. Beyond disappointed. Waste of money. Waiting to hear back from customer service regarding this junk. Update : Anker responded immediately and shipped a new power charger. New works as advertised. Customer service was awesome, happy customer for life. Highly recommend this charger.
customer_reviews.author: NorthCoastChick

customer_reviews.title: Anker does not honor their warranty
customer_reviews.text: Anker has an 18 month warranty on this charger, but does not honor it. My charger failed after six months and I contacted them for support. I went through their process, provided all of the requested documentation, they admitted there was a problem with the charger, and then failed to honor their warranty. When the charger works it's fine, but don't count on Anker to stand behind their products or honor their warranty. Update: After multiple emails, denials, and Anker trying to avoid responsibility I was eventually escalated to a higher level of customer support. They finally sent me a new charger. It was a frustrating experience, but they eventually did honor the warranty.
customer_reviews.author: Jeffrey K.

customer_reviews.title: Love it!
customer_reviews.text: LOVE THIS BATTERY! It’s great it chargers quickly and holds a charge for a long time when I’m not using it. I bought this manly to charge my phone (that had a terrible battery) while traveling and now I use it all the time! It is a little heavy so just be warned, the case is a nice buff, but for me the fact that it completely charges my phone from 0%-100% 4-5 times is worth it plus it charges my tablets as well. It performed wonderfully abroad and domestically, even after a family member dropped, and I’ve had it for a year now so hopefully it keeps working *fingers crossed*
customer_reviews.author: Atiya

customer_reviews.title: Gift for Wilderness Hubby
customer_reviews.text: I bought this because my luddite husband's vintage cellphone battery is a power sieve. When he goes to deer camp where they have no electricity in the cabin, I worry about him and feel much better if he has the ability to phone home. I purchased this as a way to settle my nerves whenever he is in the woods with no access to an outlet. He plugs in the phone, wanders around until he can pick up a cell signal, then sends home a text to let me know he's okay.
customer_reviews.author: Mel

customer_reviews.title: My Backpacking Battery
customer_reviews.text: I use this with a 21w Anker folding solar panel while backpacking, camping, etc and have never run out of power for my camera or phone. My only complaint is that you can't charge the battery while the battery is in use. It's not a big deal since the panel can charge two devices simultaneously and I rarely need to charge more than one device at a time. The battery pack has floated down rivers with me(in a dry bag), spent all day in the hot sun, and generally been abused. It just keeps on working to my pleasure. It will also power a raspberry pi for longer than I have ever needed.
customer_reviews.author: GeekFrog

customer_reviews.title: This is My Second Purchase
customer_reviews.text: The portable charger is great for backpacks that have cord access to it. I bought the second one because I bought a business backpack just for my laptop and accessories. I charged my phone twice so far and the charger is still showing 4 bars and it did charge quicker than other portable chargers I have. I gave it 4 stars for traveling but that's only because it's pretty heavy. I wouldn't walk around with it in my pocket or my purse.
customer_reviews.author: Tina Barton

customer_reviews.title: 'Banked-Power' On-Demand courtesy of Anker..."Are You Happy?"--Definitely...what's not to like?
customer_reviews.text: Absolutely wonderful idea and product...this was a lifesaver on a recent trip where the voltages were so different than USA standards, and so it eliminated entirely trying to search and find electrical converters and plug adapters...it came 3/4 charged, and with the included USB-specific Anker cord, it recharges quickly, and can fully recharge the battery on a Samsung Galaxy Notebook about 3-4 times from depletion, and an I-Phone battery reportedly up to six times. Well worth the price for such convenience and peace of mind. It came with a soft mesh carrying case (more like a protector), but a hard case made specifically for storing and transporting this power bank is sold separately for about $12.99.
customer_reviews.author: Kate O.Top Contributor: Philosophy

customer_reviews.title: Hours of power!
customer_reviews.text: I travel a lot and I only fly international. My trips are either 36 hours (door to door) to Asia or 25 hours to Eastern Europe. I spend a lot of time using my Bluetooth headphones, cell phone and tablet. Whether it is watching movies, playing games or listening to music & books I go through a lot of juice. This battery provides tons of reliable power. I can recharge my phone, headphone & tablet multiple times and not make much of a dent in my reserve. I even let friends recharge without any concerns about running out. Excellent & highly recommended - great size for what you get in return.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff in Texas

customer_reviews.title: Great WHEN it decides to work
customer_reviews.text: Great product WHEN it works. ☹️ Super disappointed. Heard great things about Anchor portable chargers for travel but I have now purchased TWO and both have stoped working in LESS than a year. I plug them in the wall with appropriate cord and wall plug & let them fully charge (all 4 blue lights). BUT when I try to use with my actual phone (when I am out) it’ll turn on as soon as I insert the usb and stop working 2 min later with no luck of turning back on. Super annoyed and upset $100+ later and 2 non working portable chargers
customer_reviews.author: Melina

customer_reviews.title: It’s AWESOME! Never Vacation without it!
customer_reviews.text: This is really awesome. It’s small & compact and works perfectly. Charges your phone faster than anything else. I took it on vacation with me to Europe and while you run out of battery power so fast (because of all the pics and videos being taken) this device charges the phone while you’re having lunch and you are at full power once again to hit up the sights without missing a single beat. It was a saving grace. I would definitely recommend this product and I would buy again. And you can charge two phones at once. Super fast!
customer_reviews.author: shannon

customer_reviews.title: Best portable charger I've ever had, so I bought spares!
customer_reviews.text: Love love love these! I own a travel agency that specializes in trips to Cuba, and these are great for recharging devices while we're on the go (not all outlets there are 110v/American style). I have five of these 20k MaH juice boxes (as we call them), and they are dearly loved lifesavers. Super fast charging, and doesn't make my phone feel super hot. Love, too, that the cord that comes with it can recharge from a USB port to the micro input, or flip around and charge from the unit to my devices. I got a mutipack of lightning cables for the Apple-using folks, and everything fits in the included pouch. Excellent product. I highly recommend it.
customer_reviews.author: GVKW

customer_reviews.title: Defective and wasn't working within 1 week.
customer_reviews.text: Followed the good reviews here. But my unit stopped working just after 1 week. I received a defective unit but since I bought this product while I was on vacation in the US. I am unable to get a replacement - so it's hard to recommend this product. QA I think is taking a slip.
customer_reviews.author: Y. Cabrera

customer_reviews.title: Battery pack was replaced aftee being defective.
customer_reviews.text: Update!!! The company replaced my defective device! This is good customer service and I’m changing my rating to 5 stars. I bought this charger after several recommendations from friends and Amazon reviews in November of 2017. It’s now July 2018 and it doesn’t charge any of my devices. I haven’t even used the device more than maybe 7 or 8 times (mostly due to having access to chargers most of the time). I’m extremely disappointed in a product that came so highly recommended.
customer_reviews.author: Tahirah F.

customer_reviews.title: Best investment ever!!!
customer_reviews.text: I'm always skeptical about purchasing electronic devices online but after this product being recommended to me by my sister, I made the plunge and bought one! Let me tell you, it's worth every penny!!! It takes a while to fully charge the portable charger, but once it is, it'll last you for a while (a few days). This was very important for me since my family likes to travel a lot and being able to charge our phones is essential. I ended up buying two more, ow my daughter, husband, and myself each have our own!
customer_reviews.author: Cynthia

customer_reviews.title: Product is great BUT only for 10 months
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this product November 2017 it’s been great up until now. I recently charged it again this past week to use for this weekend for a car show but when I needed to use it, it didn’t work anymore. At first I thought it was my phone but then I had other people try it out with their USB cable and same thing. I really love this brand and it sucks that I have to leave this review as I recently bought their wireless charger for my iPhone and that one is great! Hopefully the company can do something about this since it has a “18 month warranty” per their description.
customer_reviews.author: Susie

customer_reviews.title: The best battery I've had!
customer_reviews.text: I have had my share of batteries over time, by far this one has fit the bill for almost 3 years now...sadly I have to replace it now only because it was stolen! I listen to a lot of online music service at work in the wee hours of the morning...so plugging in to additional power is a must!! (via Bluetooth earbuds) I love this capacity as I am a little forgetful and I can space charging it for several days before its a must....but overall the best battery I have ever had...
customer_reviews.author: Dave c.

customer_reviews.title: 10/10 recommend
customer_reviews.text: I bought this for traveling and after reviewing many different battery packs I’m glad I paid for this one. It will last DAYS of charging my phone (sometimes 2 phones!) and its very durable. I have accidently dropped it a few times and it has no dents or scratches! It turns off after 20-30seconds of nothing charging even with the cord hooked up to it. The only down fall is it cannot charge and charge your device at the same time but this is better for the overall life of the battery! It does take about 10hrs to fully charge but its worth it when it lasts days with a charge.
customer_reviews.author: Bear

customer_reviews.title: Update: power horse, power support
customer_reviews.text: Update: Anker was quick to respond and easy to work with. Stellar product support. I received a replacement within a week. I wish all companies were this prompt and professional. Original review: I've had this charger for less than 3 years. It has probably been used a dozen times. It has not been dropped or damaged. It no longer holds charges. ANKER usually has solid product support. I will reach out to Anker and will update this review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon7Customer

customer_reviews.title: Perfect battery on the go!
customer_reviews.text: Love this product and bought 2 more smaller ones with 3.0 quick charging. Used on my Samsung Note8 and Note4 for when working IT jobs on the go. Only thing is it takes a while to charge to full capacity so i do that over night and by the morning comes around it's fully charge. I'd recommend this to a friend but i bought something new and better. Thanks Anker but there's something better now!
customer_reviews.author: Brian

customer_reviews.title: A good buy!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this since I use my phone a lot for maps and GPS while I’m out hiking and backpacking. It has been a great battery and so far very dependable. I’ve used it on a few different big hikes/mountaineering trips and it has been so helpful for keeping my phone charged while I’m using the navigation. The battery was a bit bigger than I expected and it barely fits into the front of my pack’s pocket but it works and the charge lasts! I have used this charger for days on end without even having to charge it so that’s a big plus. A definite recommended purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Brittany Roper

customer_reviews.title: Edited review after Anker Support
customer_reviews.text: ***UPDATE*** So Anker reaches out to me and sent me a new power bank. Wonderful customer service. I will see if this one last longer. I’m wary due to the other reviews that say it only works for a few months. So far though, they’ve remedied the problem and I’ve upgraded from 1 star to 4. Will edit the review if the same thing happens again. I got about 8 months of use out of it before it stopped working. Won’t hold a charge anymore. I plug it in for days and only 2 of the lights light up. Worthless brick now.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer C

customer_reviews.title: Awesome product
customer_reviews.text: I like the product for someone who’s aways on there phone I don’t aways wanna plug it into a wall and wait hours I just wish I could charge two things at once and the little book says to charge it full like every 4 months but I fell that’s a little impossible I fell I have to charge it every other day or so just cause I like it being at 100% just a bar down stresses me out 🙄 but I love the product I use it daily plan on ordering more
customer_reviews.author: Terence Anderson

customer_reviews.title: Very Powerful
customer_reviews.text: I wasn't expecting much from it but it turned out to be very powerful. It takes a long time for it to charge itself but it charges my devices lightning fast. I use this to charge my samsung s6 edge plus, iphone 6 plus, nikon b700, pivothead, go pro hero5, bose soundlink color. i love it just love it! UPDATE:(DEC 21, 2017) This thing is a BEAST! Not only can it charge our samsung note 8 and iphone x twice over it charges pretty quick! I ACCIDENTALLY DROPPED IT FROM THE LANDING OF OUR 2ND FLOOR APARTMENT IT's STILL VERY INTACT!
customer_reviews.author: king of anything

customer_reviews.title: Recharged dead phones multiple times, so handy!
customer_reviews.text: This device is excellent for recharging my dead or almost dead IPhone battery multiple times without becoming dead itself. Very useful for traveling and every day use, I also keep this in my purse just in case. I also bought a case for it to keep this and the charging cable in to help keep everything together. I loved this so much I bought one for my dad for Father’s Day as he travels on a regular basis and was having issues keeping his cell phone charged, he really enjoys it and uses it often.
customer_reviews.author: Merissa P

customer_reviews.title: lasts a long time when fully charged, but it came damaged
customer_reviews.text: I love the performance of the product and everything about it, my only grievance is that it arrived damaged in the box with no packaging damage visible. The outer plastic shell is cracked near the power button and the charge level indicator lights do not work. It appears it was dropped prior to being shipped. I leave it on the charger for a few days to make sure it is full then it will charge my Iphone roughly 4 1/2 times
customer_reviews.author: Keenan

customer_reviews.title: ANKER IS THE BEST POWERBANK BRAND, PERIOD!!!!
customer_reviews.text: ANKER is my new love for the last 4 years now after Mophie was just horrible after less than a year of owning it. I now own multiple Ankers over the years because I use Small & Big ones for traveling & daily uses. And they make GREAT gifts for anyone! They work well for both Apple & Andriod, & they can do 3-4 full charges EACH PHONE! No kidding!!!! I highly recommend any Anker products & the higher the MAH, the more money you wanna invest so you can have more charges saved for life.
customer_reviews.author: Shadpari

customer_reviews.title: The only battery you’ll ever need
customer_reviews.text: Let me tell you guys something, this battery is amazing! This is actually my second one, cause I lost the first one. I would take this battery everywhere with me. It would last all day at the very least. The battery comes with a sleeve to put it in so you don’t have to worry too much about it getting banged around, it’s also built very well so not like you have to worry. When you get your hands on this battery it feels like a good quality product, the size is good, the material feels durable, it’s solid. You can not go wrong with this battery or even any of the baker products. They are the best!!!!
customer_reviews.author: Steven R.

product_meta.title: Portable Charger Anker PowerCore 20100mAh - Ultra High Capacity Power Bank with 4.8A Output and PowerIQ Technology, External Battery Pack for iPhone, iPad & Samsung Galaxy & More (Black)
product_meta.description:
Color:BlackModel number: A1271
Anker PowerCore 20100
High-Speed-charging, long-lasting, portable power. 

From ANKER, America's Leading USB Charging Brand
• Faster and safer charging with our advanced technology
• 50 million+ happy users and counting

Ultra-High Capacity
Enough power to keep you going for days. Charge an iPhone 8 almost seven times, a Galaxy S8 five times or an iPad mini twice.

High-Speed Charging Technology
Exclusive to Anker, PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to ensure your devices charge at their their fastest possible charge speed. Does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge.

Enormous 4.8A Output
Industry leading output of 4.8 amps provides enough power to simultaneously charge any combination of devices at full speed. 

MultiProtect Safety System
Surge protection, short circuit protection and more advanced safety features keep you and your devices safe.

Matte Finish
Enhances grip and doesn't leave smudges or fingerprints.

World Famous Warranty
At Anker, we believe in our products. That's why we back them all with an 18-month warranty and provide friendly, easy-to-reach support.

For Optimal Use:
• Use the included cable, your original cable or a third-party certified one (such as MFi); AC adapter not included.
• Please use your original Apple charging cable (not included) to charge Apple products.
• Compatible with most USB-charged devices, including iPhone 8 / X / XS / XS Max / XR (Lightning cable required), Android smartphones and tablets (including the Nexus 7), USB-C MacBooks / iPad (USB A to C cable required).
• Not compatible with the iPod nano, iPod Classic; Not for devices with an input below 50mA (e.g. some Bluetooth headsets and GPS devices).

What's In the Box
PowerCore 20100 Portable Charger
Micro USB cable
Travel Pouch
Welcome Guide
feature_bullets: The Anker Advantage:Join the 50 million+ powered by our leading technology.
Ultra-High Capacity:Weighs as little as a can of soup (12.5 oz) yet charges the iPhone 8 almost seven times, the Galaxy S8 five times or the iPad mini 4 twice.

High-Speed Charging: PowerIQ and VoltageBoost combine to deliver the fastest possible charge(does not support Qualcomm Quick Charge). Recharges itself in 10 hours with a 2 amp charger, phone chargers (generally 1 amp) may take up to 20 hours.
Certified Safe: Anker's MultiProtect safety system ensures complete protection for you and your devices.
What You Get: Anker PowerCore 20100 Portable Charger, Micro USB cable, travel pouch, welcome guide, Lightning cable for iPhone / iPad sold separately.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.5 out of 5 stars32,727 ratings4.5 out of 5 stars
